description: Non-material amendments to approved drawings under condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 2021/5347/P dated 24/08/2022 and change to cycle store configuration required under condition 4 (cycle storage specification) (Planning permission 2021/5347/P dated 24/08/22 was for 'change of use of ground and upper floors of the building from members club (Sui Generis) to use as offices (Class E), enlargement of existing cycle & shower facilities, replacement and reconfiguration of rooftop plant, to accommodate extension for additional office space (Class E), retention and refurbishment of basement to allow for continued studio use (Sui Generis)'  The non-material amendments hereby proposed include: PV panels at roof level (Betterton Street elevation), the omission of rooflights (Shorts Gardens and Betterton Street elevation), the retention of doors to the sub-station (Betterton Street elevation) and set-back to stair core (Betterton Street elevation).
